summary: Tested 4 user-reported issues. ALL 4 ISSUES FIXED: Issue 1 (Screener auto-load) - 43 results auto-loaded, Issue 2 (PMCC auto-load) - scan triggered (0 results expected when market closed), Issue 3 (Simulator PMCC Tracker) - 7 positions displayed with LEAPS Cost/Premium Income/Income-Cost ratio/Est. LEAPS Decay, Issue 4 (Watchlist) - 13 items with analyst ratings and earnings dates populated.

issues: Console warnings about chart dimensions (-1 width/height) - cosmetic issue, charts still render

context_for_next_testing_agent: All 4 reported issues are now fixed. Screener and PMCC pages auto-load results on navigation. PMCC Tracker shows 7 positions with detailed metrics. Watchlist shows 13 items with analyst ratings (Buy, Strong Buy, Hold) and earnings dates. Some symbols (AMSC, FLY, NKTR) show '-' for analyst/earnings as yfinance has no data for them - this is expected behavior.

issue_1_screener_auto_load.evidence: Screener page auto-loaded 43 results on navigation to /screener. Results table shows Symbol, Price, Strike, DTE, Premium, ROI, Delta, IV, IV Rank, OI, Score, Analyst, Earnings columns.

issue_2_pmcc_auto_load.evidence: PMCC page triggered scan on navigation to /pmcc. Shows '0 Results' which is expected when market is closed. Pre-computed scans show 3, 19, 15 opportunities available.

issue_3_simulator_pmcc_tracker.evidence: PMCC Tracker tab shows 7 active positions with: Total LEAPS Investment ($25,542), Total Premium Income ($84,796), Income/Cost Ratio (332.0%), Active Positions (7/7). Individual position cards show LEAPS Cost, Premium Income, Realized P/L, Income/Cost ratio, Est. LEAPS Decay with health indicators (good/warning).

issue_4_watchlist_analyst_earnings.evidence: Watchlist shows 13 items with Analyst column (Buy, Strong Buy, Hold ratings visible) and Earnings column (12d, 17d, 25d, 39d, 40d, 11d visible). Some symbols (AMSC, FLY, NKTR) show '-' as yfinance has no data for them.
issue_4_watchlist_analyst_earnings.code_location: backend/routes/watchlist.py lines 200-275 POST /api/watchlist/ with yfinance fallback
